column5: Just recently I was told that the law has changed this year, for Ontario, regarding boat trailers. I heard that the safety chains on the trailer to the pulling vehicle have to be a SOLID LINK attachment, now. Not a hook type style. Could someone enlighten me on this, please?Thank you.RANGER"KEEP YOUR LINES WET, YOUR POWDER DRY and THE BEER COLD!"
Top. Any help, here?RANGER"KEEP YOUR LINES WET, YOUR POWDER DRY and THE BEER COLD!"
